hero.title: Starter Template for Web Developers
hero.description: Starter template optimized for SEO and performance. A solid foundation to start your projects with best practices.

features.title: What's Included
features.subtitle: A selection of tools and configurations to streamline your workflow.
features.optimizedSeoDesc: Base configuration for Meta tags, Open Graph, and Sitemap generation.
features.highPerformanceDesc: Lightweight structure for fast load times.
features.tailwindDesc: Integrated configuration with the latest version of Tailwind CSS.

development.title: Development
development.description: We provide a solid foundation to start your projects with best practices.

openSource.title: Open Source & Community
openSource.description: Join the revolution of modern web development. This project is open for everyone to use, learn from, and contribute to.
openSource.openSourceDesc: Developed under the MIT license, free for personal and commercial use.
openSource.communityDrivenDesc: Built with the feedback and contributions of the developer community.
openSource.regularUpdatesDesc: Continuously improved with the latest technologies and best practices.

blog.title: Our Publications
blog.subtitle: Explore the latest news, tutorials, and articles from our team.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Get in touch with us to discuss your next project.

means.title: We are here to help you
means.subtitle: Choose the communication channel you prefer. We respond in less than 24 hours.
means.personalizedDesc: We understand your needs to offer tailored solutions.
means.technicalDesc: We resolve any doubt or technical incident quickly.
means.strategicDesc: We advise you to ensure the success of your project.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Discover our web development, SEO optimization, and technology consulting services.

intro.description: Comprehensive solutions designed to maximize the potential of your digital presence.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: Static and dynamic sites built for the modern era.
webDevelopment.longDescription: We specialize in building fast, secure, and scalable websites using the latest technologies. We transform your vision into an impactful digital experience.
webDevelopment.responsiveDesc: Your site will look perfect on any device, from mobiles to desktop screens.
webDevelopment.performanceDesc: Fast loading to improve user experience and SEO positioning.

seo.title: SEO Optimization
seo.description: We ensure your content is found by those looking for it.
seo.longDescription: We help your business get found by the right people. Our organic positioning strategies are designed to improve your organic visibility.
seo.auditDesc: We deeply analyze your website to identify technical and content improvement opportunities.
seo.contentDesc: We create relevant content plans that attract and retain your target audience.

consulting.title: IT Consulting
consulting.description: Technical advice to scale your projects to the next level.
consulting.longDescription: We accompany you in critical decision-making. We evaluate your current infrastructure and design personalized roadmaps to take your company to the next technological level.
consulting.transformationDesc: We guide you in adopting new technologies to optimize your business processes.
consulting.architectureDesc: We design robust and scalable systems prepared for future growth.

404.title: 404 - Page Not Found
404.description: We're sorry, we can't find the page you're looking for. It may have been moved or deleted.
